extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is upgrading to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager to version 12.1.2.172 or later to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Stop and Disable Veeam Services
extracted_playbook.description: Stop and disable the Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager and Veeam RESTful API services to mitigate vulnerabilities.
